Html:
Hi, great project, thanks for sharing it!

Im experimenting with it and while i was trying to find out what colors and sizes work best as markers, I set my 'addMarker' button to show the marker.RepresentativeColor.

The strange thing is, that even for well recognized markers, the RepresentativeColor differs from the actual color of the item.

The one I have had best results with is a light green, and it shows up as black, sometimes blue.

Maybe im confusing something, but so far I cant see why it behaves like that.

Can anyone explain this?

Hi Pollux, I apologize for this bug in my 1.0 release.
I've fixed RepresentativeColor with change 25662 on November 4th.
You can download the latest files from our source repository to see the update.
- Mike
Thanks for your reply and the update!
